body.name: iZEEKER Dash Cam for Cars, 1080P Full HD Dash Camera, Dashcam with Night Vision, Car Camera with 3-inch LCD Display, Parking Mode, G-Sensor, Loop Recording, WDR, 32GB MicroSD Card
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 43 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 43 mins
features: 🎁【User-Friendly & Best Cost-effective Dash Cam】This dash cam has all the functions set by default, which means that even for a novice, it’s easy to set up and use from day 1. It is the real deal and perfect for anyone wanting to document and store traffic accidents. And with its sleek design and impressive packaging, it makes for a fantastic gift for the holidays.

【1080P Full HD Resolution & 3" LCD Display】With 1080P@30fps full HD resolution and a 170° wide angle lens, the dash cam reduces blind spots and captures excellent quality footage. The three-inch LCD screen allows you to monitor and replay key moments even if driving at high speeds.

【MicroSD Card Included & Auto Recording & Loop Recording】With the included MicroSD card, the dashcam will automatically start/ stop recording when the car is on/off. The Loop Recording function automatically overwrites past unlocked videos to free up more space for new videos. The 32GB MicroSD card can usually record for a week. If the video is not needed after the card is full, just delete or format it manually to re-record.
🎁NOTE: Starting December 18, 2023, this dash cam model is sold with a 32GB MicroSD card and it has been inserted into the dashcam's card slot. Please feel free to contact us with any questions.

【Automatic & Manual Emergency Recording】With the built-in G-sensor, this dash camera can automatically detect sudden vibration or shock and save it as evidence. Press the lock button to manually lock the current video, so even if there is no impact but you see something interesting/important on the road you can lock in the footage.

【Two Parking Modes Supported】When the parking monitoring function is turned on, even when the vehicle is powered off, the car camera will provide up to 5 minutes of video recording after sensing vibration or impact, providing effective protection for unmanned vehicles. If equipped with an extra hardwire kit, the camera can monitor continuously, for those who need to park for a long time or just want to have the camera filming at all times (hardwire kits: https://www.amazon.com//dp/B0BNKSRFTD).

【Intimate After-sales Service】Enthusiastic customer care personnel will provide you with technical support and spare part replacements for the dash cam without any cost at any time. (Warranty: 2 years).

📝As all car chargers that come with dashcams need to be plugged into car cigarette lighters, if your car does not have a cigarette lighter, please get a USB power cable without any cost from iZEEKER official.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing iZEEKER Star Product- GD100 Note: As all car chargers that come with dashcams need to be plugged into car cigarette lighters, if your car does not have a cigarette lighter, please get a USB power cable without any cost from iZEEKER official.. P.S. No matter what questions you have about the dash cam, we sincerely hope we can have the opportunity to solve it for you immediately. We are responsible for every dashcam we sell. Thanks for your trust and support!

WHAT’S IN THE BOX 1080P Front Camera with 32GB MicroSD Card Suction Cup Crowbar for Installation Car Charger with USB Port and 3.5m Cable Quick Start Guide with QR Code of User Manual Mini USB Cable for Files Transfer on Computer Free replacement accessories are provided when reaching out to iZEEKER. iZEEKER - The brand you can trust --Your Virtual eye capturing everything Warm Tips: 1. Starting December 18, 2023, this dash cam model is sold with a 32GB MicroSD card and it has been inserted into the dashcam's card slot. Please format the memory card on the camera when first use. 2. The package comes with a Quick Start Guide for quick use. Scan the QR Code on the Guide to download the Detailed User Manual if needed. It can also be downloaded on this product page or by reaching out to iZEEKER directly. Video Resolution: 1080P Screen: 3" LCD Screen Loop Recording: OFF / 1 / 3 / 5 minutes G-Sensor: OFF / Low / Medium / High Working Temperature: 4℉ to 140℉ Built-in Battery: Lithium-ion battery (cigarette lighter must be connected for power supply, same for all dashcams).

1080P Full HD Night Recording Thanks to advanced sensors, the F1.8 aperture and Wide Dynamic Range, GD100 can record full clear videos under low-light conditions to meet your daily recording needs during nighttime. Note: As all car chargers that come with dashcams need to be plugged into car cigarette lighters, if your car does not have a cigarette lighter, please get a USB power cable without any cost from iZEEKER official. Screensaver With the screensaver function, the screen will be dark after the setting time to make sure you can concentrate on driving, but the little flashing blue light on the camera screen means the dash cam is recording. Note: If you prefer the camera screen staying on during driving, please turn off the screensaver function on the camera menu. 32GB MicroSD Card Included The included 32GB MicroSD card has been inserted into the card slot. Before first time use, you MUST format the memory card in the camera to prevent any errors and for smooth operation. Note: Because there are many fake cards on the market and problems related to card compatibility, we cannot ensure that all 128GB cards can be used. But a 32GB one is definitely applicable.

Mobile Phone Charging Port The car charger of the dash cam is connected to the cigarette lighter and it has an extra usb Type-A port so you can use it to charge your phone. Note: This dash cam is currently only suitable for cars with cigarette lighters. If your car does not have a cigarette lighter, please reach out to iZEEKER to get a free Mini USB power cable. Easy to Transmit Easily connect to your PC/MAC with the included mini usb data transfer cable to play or backup. And then Select Connect as a Mass Storage. Note: To ensure smooth playback, we suggest using players such as Potplayer/ VLC/ KM Player instead of Windows Media Player. One Click Lock If you witness an accident, a near miss, or would like to save/lock the video manually, all you have to do is to press one button. All locked videos will not be deleted automatically by the loop recording function. Note: Deleting a single locked video on the dash cam requires unlocking the video first. The "Format" option on the camera menu can delete all videos at once.

----------Frequently Questions and Answers----------- Q1: Can I use a 128GB MicroSD card for this dash cam? A1: Regarding the question you mentioned, because there are many fake cards on the market and problems related to card compatibility, we cannot ensure that all 128GB cards can be used. What we can be sure of is that 32GB is definitely applicable. If you want to try a 128GB MicroSD card, please format it to FAT32 or EXFAT or other format on the Computer first, and then format it again on the Camera before use. (Please don't click Quick Format when formatting the SD card on the computer.) Q2: Will the dash cam turn on/off automatically when I turn on/off my car engine? A2: Yes. If not, please check and make sure the connection between the power ports and cables are tight or reach out iZEEKER for help. Q3. Should the dash cam always be on charging to keep recording during my driving? A3: Just like all dash cams on the market , this dash camera is built-in battery, the battery capacity is small. As a dash cam, it is used with power supply all the time during driving. Large battery will cause the security affairs like battery explosion. If you prefer the long time monitoring during parking, we suggest to use a hard wire kit for power supply. Q4. What if my card cannot work on the dash cam and creating damaged files? A4: If your card cannot not work on the dash camera, please get a good and new class 10 or higher speed 32GB MicroSD card or reach out to iZEEKER to get a free 32GB Micro SD card. Q5. What if my car doesn't have a cigarette lighter? A5: As all car chargers that come with dashcams need to be plugged into car cigarette lighters, if your car does not have a cigarette lighter, please get a USB power cable without any cost from iZEEKER official. Also, please kindly note that due to long-term transportation, the built-in battery of the dash cam may be exhausted during the process. Therefore, after receiving the dash cam, please charge it for about 15 minutes before using it. Note:Please submit queries and discussions about the product itself in the Customer Questions and Answers section. Suggestions and sharing related to the use of the product are also encouraged and valued.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good dash cam for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a good dash cam for the price. Easy to install and set up. For the price it has good quality and features. I would recommend to others. Good customer service also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using it for 5 months now, and no issues at all! Was able to set up the dash cam to my liking, and the suction cup stuck great to my windshield. After around 3-4 months, I ended up witnessing and recording an accident (which I retrieved and sent in as evidence), and all I had to do was plug in the dash cam using the same cord to my computer. I accidentally took off the suction cup not realizing the camera can slide off the suction cup holder, but it stuck back on great and hasn’t fallen off! The photo attached shows what the camera quality looks like at night when parked. It’s not perfect, but good enough to make out any important details. If you’re looking for a cheap dash cam, definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Update:Support reached out to me about the camera. While it took about 3-4 weeks of correspondence they did arrange for a new camera to be sent. The new one is working so far after about 4 days of use. We will see how this one fares.Was:I bought this camera a while ago but only started using it about 2 months ago. It worked fine for about six weeks. But now it no longer records. It tries, but it repeatedly switches between record and stopped mode every 3 seconds or so, writing 31.5MB files every time it switches. The files have no video content in them. The menus are very slow to respond.I reset it using the reset button as well as reset to the default settings. The menus were fast for about 10 seconds after that, then back to the old, broken behavior.I tried to visit the iZEEKER website for support but it is non-responsive.I guess I'm out of luck. I would look elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap dash cam that works
reviews.reviewText: I use this on two of our household cars and it works great. Good video quality and easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars CAUTION! NO warranty nor parts / free USB cable if purchased from Amazon warehouse or 3rd parties
reviews.reviewText: The GD100 is a great camera for the money. I purchased this product for the 2-year warranty and especially the free USB cable they claim to provide if needed (my car doesn't have a cigarette lighter).I learned the hard way, this only applies to sales made directly from the iZeeker Store. Purchases from the Amazon Warehouse and third party resellers have NO 2-year warranty, NO free replacement parts, and NO USB power cable upon request.Again, it's a great camera for the money, but if you need the USB power cable be absolutely sure you are purchasing directly from iZeeker. Do not follow the "Buy New & Used from...", nor the "Other Amazon Sellers" links unless you don't need the USB cable nor want a 2-year warranty.I have followed the "report an issue or error on this page" link and asked that the warranty and parts replacement text be edited to clearly state it does not apply to iZekker products sold by Amazon Warehouse nor any other "third parties."I have been in contact with iZeeker and Amazon. My only recourse is to return the camera to the seller (Amazon Warehouse). All I wanted was the advertised USB cable so I could enjoy the camera. …Hoping this helps other buyers. …

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars no OFF for loop
reviews.reviewText: The company iZEEKER was responsive THROUGH email (wouldn't call). had a couple of emails and wasn't directed to someone more senior immediately. AND with that: they would not recommend another one of their products, which might serve my needs better.my problem: i wanted to shut off the LOOP which only gives you 1MIN. 3 MIN. 5MIN. -NO OFF.- which you continue the recording until the SD card is full then you can wipe the SD and start over again. Which i like. i want to be 100% i am recording. NOW- my problem is AMAZON. because AMAZON in the description says it has this option. IT DOES NOT. if i could give a star to AMAZON it would be 2 they get one for the delivery and the other for the return ( even though i had to pay for the label to be printed and for the packaging at my local UPS)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera at a great price...
reviews.reviewText: So I got this back in March and used a memory card I purchased separately off Amazon. It was fairly easy to setup and attached to the window easily.... So now it's October and I can say it's one of the best purchases I've made on Amazon. And really everyone should have one in their car. And for the price it's within anyone's budget. Thank God I havent had any accidents but I've captured a lot of near misses. I live in Jersey and people drive crazy in this state. And should I ever have an accident, I'm confident this camera with document what happened. I had an issue with the memory card I was using and contacted the seller who was very nice and sent me a replacement at no cost - and it was a good one - SanDisk... I actually bought this camera over others based on the good reviews that mentioned the excellent customer service. Cassie from Izeeker answered my emails promptly and was very nice 👍All in all I haven't had any issues with the camera. People complaining about the suction cup - if you clean the window well with alcohol it should hold well. I been through cold weather and a hot summer and it never came down even once. I haven't had any issues with the card reformatting that I seen a few people mention and the video quality is good and reliable.Hope this review helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice unit
reviews.reviewText: easy to use and work with, nice price!!

reviews.reviewTitle: It's not quality, but it works.
reviews.reviewText: Even though it's 1080P, there's no way it'll pass for that. It's SUPER grainy and you'd never make our license plate numbers. But for the cheap price it would be enough to prove out insurance claims. That's why I bought it, just for things like who pulled out of where and was the light green, etc. If you're gonna upload to youtube or actually film anything it's barely 480P, the quality is NOT good. But it does work, it records well, and it's easy to install. So like a 1/10 for video quality, and so far a 10/10 for 'does it work'.

Been using this for 3 months travelling within BC and sometimes between Calgary and BC. When i review the videos each week, there are maybe 2 or 3 with error messages that will not open ( hopefully, this won’t happen if an accident happens and it can be captured on video). Image quality is really good. I’ve used a 128GB micro-SD and the trick is to format it to FAT32, not the default format for this SD card. Otherwise, you’ll get an error message when inserting into the camera.
quality is very good compared to my old one. night vision is very clear. used it in my new suv
This camera doesn't record any video, i changed two SD card as per recommendation of this company but none of them worked here after that i returned this product.
